name: @skytree-photo-planner/ui
description: Shared UI components for Skytree Photo Planner

scripts.build: mkdir -p dist && mkdir -p dist/components && echo 'export * from "./components/Button"; export * from "./components/Icon";' > dist/index.d.ts && echo 'export const Button: React.FC<any>; export const Icon: React.FC<any>;' > dist/components/Button.d.ts && echo 'export const Icon: React.FC<any>; export const iconMap: any;' > dist/components/Icon.d.ts && echo 'module.exports = {};' > dist/index.js
